content: perfect for any season and very quick to make it may look like a hard pattern but it is quite easy you just crochet a rectangle fold the corners in sew a little piece and voila you have an awesome cocoon cardigan directions are written for xxs/xs s/m and l/xl but it is very easy to make the cardigan larger or smaller a medium weight yarn is used in the picture but if you prefer to use a lighter weight yarn you can definitely adjust it by chaining more in the beginning
